Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Rasmodia... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Rasmodia... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and..., well, wife!$h

Entries.BirthMessage_SpouseMother: During the night, your wife gave birth to a baby {0}.
Entries.HavePlayerBabyQuestion: Do you want to have a baby?
Entries.HavePlayerBabyQuestion_Adoption: Do you want to adopt a baby?

Entries.Wizard_Text: I seek an extremely rare and powerful goop, known as 'ectoplasm'. It can be found in the remains of slain ghosts.      -M. Rasmodia
Entries.Wizard_Objective_0_Text: Deliver an ectoplasm to the Witch
Entries.Wizard2_Text: I require assistance in tracking down the rare and dangerous prismatic slime, within the local caves. Bring me a jar of its prismatic jelly and you will be duly rewarded.          -M. Rasmodia
Entries.Wizard2_Objective_1_Text: Deliver a prismatic jelly to the Witch

Entries.Wizard_Objective_0_Message: Ah, It's brimming with the energy of forgotten souls... perfect.$h#$b#Now, let me work, my love. I shall require perfect silence to discern the true nature of this substance.
Entries.Wizard2_Objective_1_Message: Ah... you've returned from the hunt. I sense that you were successful!$h#$b#Now, hand me the jelly and let me work, my love. This is important.

Entries.1: Location/Meet The Witch/You received a letter from the local witch. She claims to have information regarding the old community center./Enter the witch's tower./WizardHouse/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.28: Basic/Dark Talisman/The Witch asked me to retrieve the magic ink from her ex-wife's house... but to gain access I'll need a dark talisman./Enter the sewer and ask Krobus about the dark talisman./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.111: ItemDelivery/A Dark Reagent/The Witch wants you to descend into the mines and fetch her a Void Essence. She needs it for some kind of dark magic./Bring Rasmodia a Void Essence./Wizard 769/-1/1000/-1/true/Ah, you've brought it. You have earned my gratitude. Please, take this in return. Coin means little to me.$1
Entries.123: ItemDelivery/Staff Of Power/The Witch is creating a staff of phenomenal power. Who knows what it's for. She needs an iridium bar to finish it./Bring Rasmodia an Iridium Bar./Wizard 337/-1/5000/-1/true/Ah, precious iridium. You've done well, @. You have my eternal thanks.$1

Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13546: I require {0} for potion-making. Please deliver directly to my study.     -M. Rasmodia, Witch
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13548: The Witch, M. Rasmodia, wishes to study the arcane properties of the {0}. You will be rewarded.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13553: Local witch is in search of a fresh {0}.
Entries.SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13752: The monsters known as {0} are throwing the elemental balance into disarray. I would like an adventurer to enter the mines and slay {1} of these {2}.  -M. Rasmodia, Witch

Entries.Mon8: #$1 Caroline23#When we first moved to Pelican Town I would take secret walks to the Witch's tower. Don't tell Pierre, he has jealousy issues.#$e#Abigail was born about a year after we moved to Pelican Town. I wonder if she'll ever experience life outside the valley?

Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I wonder if the witch knows about... this? I hope she can keep a secret.$s

Entries.Lewis: Good evening, @. Have you ventured into the haunted maze yet? It's quite spooky.#$e#That strange woman who lives in the tower set it all up herself. She wouldn't let anyone near while she was working on it.

Entries.wizardJunimoNote: My sources tell me you've been poking around inside the old community center.^Why don't you pay me a visit?^My chambers are west of the forest lake, in the stone tower. I may have information concerning your... 'rat problem'.^   -M. Rasmodia, Witch %item quest 1 true %%[#]Witch's Summons
Entries.Wizard: Greetings, young adept.^I have enclosed in this package an item of arcane significance. Use it wisely.   ^   -M. Rasmodia, Witch%item object 422 1 82 1 84 1 70 1 %%[#]A Gift From the Witch
Entries.winter_12_1: @-^I am researching the forgotten art of shadow divination. I require an item known as 'Void Essence'. Bring it to me and you will be rewarded.^ -M. Rasmodia, Witch %item quest 111 %%[#]Witch's Request
Entries.winter_5_2: @,^I'm creating an enchanted staff of phenomenal power.^However, I'm missing something: an Iridium Bar.^I'm willing to pay 5x the market value for it. Bring it as soon as you can.^ -M. Rasmodia, Witch %item quest 123 %%[#]Witch Needs A Rare Item
Entries.KrobusCrafting: @, I'm not sure how the human message system works, so I asked the Witch to help me write this letter.^^I hope you are doing okay.^^I wanted to share this with you... it's notes on how my people build a certain item.^^   -Krobus%item craftingRecipe Dark_Sign %%[#]A letter from Krobus
Entries.WizardReward: The specimen you delivered offered great insight into the machinations of the fell beings we call 'monsters'.^^I've formulated a pungent tincture that these beings find intoxicating. Use it with caution...^^   -M. Rasmodia, Witch%item craftingRecipe Monster_Musk %%[#]The Witch's Discovery
Entries.WizardReward2: Thanks to the ectoplasm you delivered to me, I've made a major breakthrough in the field of arcane engineering.^^Enclosed, you'll find blueprints for a most useful machine...^^   -M. Rasmodia, Witch%item craftingRecipe Mini-Obelisk %%[#]The Witch's Breakthrough

Entries.MagicInkDescription: You've found the Witch's lost {0}! Better return it to her.

BeforeMovie.Text: I sense an arcane power permeating this building tonight...

DuringMovie.Text: And to think... the layman has no idea that this is all raw, real footage!

AfterMovie.Text: For those aware of the esoteric mysteries, that had deep significance...
You pulled me from my studies for *this*?

BeforeMovie.Text: Thanks for inviting me to the movies, @!$1

AfterMovie.Text: It was a magical film! Thank you, @.$1#$e#Maybe I'll try creating the 'Brave Little Sappling' myself with magic some day!$1
*yawn* that was kinda boring.$0#$e#Oh! Um. I enjoyed the movie!$3#$e#...$3

BeforeMovie.Text: People are staring at my hat.$8

AfterMovie.Text: I was on the edge of my seat there at the end!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: People are staring at my hat.$8

AfterMovie.Text: That was a good movie! I can't wait to tell Rasmodia about it!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Can we play the 'crane game'?$1#$e#I could use a little magic to 'sweeten the odds'.$7

I've been waiting for you."/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 400/speak Wizard "Have I ever told you I used to be married?"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 800/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 800/speak Wizard "Strange, I know... for a woman like me. But it's true."/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "My wife and I were together for many years, until... until I made a mistake that drove her away."/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/speak Wizard "Her anger and envy were so intense that she turned green and began flying around the countryside, cursing everything in her path..."/pause 1000/speak Wizard "When I found out, I sealed this passage to her home... fearing that an innocent villager might fall prey to her dark magic."/move Wizard -1 0 3/speak Wizard "But now, it must be unsealed... for when we separated, she took my magic ink!#$b#I need that magic ink back!$3#$b#I would do this myself, but I... Entries.wizardsComplicatedRelationship: I understand if you have any reservations about me after witnessing what transpired...$0#$b#I certainly don't claim to be perfect.$2#$e#%Magnus doesn't want to talk anymore.
Entries.Custom_ForestWest_52_117: %Rasmodia is concentrating and doesn't notice you.

Entries.Sat4: Need to visit Rasmodia at her abode soon. Need to refresh the enchantments on a few weapons in the armory.$0
Entries.summer_Thu8: Folks in this village don't understand just how much Rasmodia does for them.$0#$e#Without her, this place probably would have been overrun by monsters long ago.$0
Entries.winter_Tue6: Singlehandedly took out several floors of monsters and secured a pile of diamonds yesterday in the mines.#$b#These diamonds will prove useful in Rasmodia's arcane studies.$0
Entries.winter_Sat: Talked to Rasmodia up in her tower yet?$0#$e#I know lotsa things come to mind when you think 'witch', but she might surprise you.$2
Entries.winter_Sat4: Rasmodia spends most of her days studying arcane properties.#$e#If you want to get on her good side, I recommend giving her void essence.

Entries.summer_Sat: Apples never speak to witch in tower.$0#$e#Witch does not give treat.$2
Entries.summer_Sat6: Maybe Apples talk to witch soon?$0#$e#Witch might have starfruit...!$1
Entries.summer_Sat10: Witch give Apples starfruit! Nice witch!$1#$e#Other Apple-friends no like witch.$2#$b#Maybe Apples tell them witch is also Apples-friend!$1

Entries.Neutral_3: Maybe Witch visit soon? Witch give Apples starfruit. Yummy!$0

Entries.Sat4: Need to visit Rasmodia at her abode soon. Need to refresh the enchantments on a few weapons in the armory.$0
Entries.summer_Thu8: Folks in this village don't understand just how much Rasmodia does for them.$0#$e#Without her, this place probably would have been overrun by monsters long ago.$0
Entries.winter_Tue6: Singlehandedly took out several floors of monsters and secured a pile of diamonds yesterday in the mines.#$b#These diamonds will prove useful in Rasmodia's arcane studies.$0
Entries.winter_Sat: Talked to Rasmodia up in her tower yet?$0#$e#I know lotsa things come to mind when you think 'witch', but she might surprise you.$2
Entries.winter_Sat4: Rasmodia spends most of her days studying arcane properties.#$e#If you want to get on her good side, I recommend giving her void essence.

Entries.fall_Tue8: The valley is in good hands with your witch, Rasmodia.$1#$e#*chuckle* We always give her a warm welcome when she visits The First Slash.$0

Entries.Introduction: Um... Greetings! My name is Morgan. I'm a pupil of Rasmodia. What's your name?$0#$e#It's been a pleasure!$1
Entries.spring_12: Teacher and I are traveling deep into the forest tomorrow.$1#$b#I won't be attending the town festival.$0#$e#She found a place with a really high concentration of raw magic. I'm excited!$3
Entries.Mon4: Rasmodia is teaching me about the magical properties of mystical ancient plants.$3#$e#She tells me the valley used to be full of them a long time ago.$1
Entries.Tue2: Teacher is giving me an exam soon. I'm ready to pass it!$1#$e#I want to protect people.$1
Entries.Thu: Do you like my hat?$1#$e#Teacher made it for me!$3
Entries.Thu2: Teacher told me there are forest sprites deep in the woods.$1#$b#Their magical powers are intertwined with the valley.$3
Entries.Sat10: Teacher said I can't join him and Marlon on their expeditions. I'm not strong enough.$0#$e#That just means I need to get stronger!$4
Entries.Sun4: Teacher and I are visiting a place called 'Sprite Spring'. She's gonna introduce me to her forest sprite friends.$1#$e#One of them goes by 'Claus'. He gave teacher the ancient seeds for her arcane studies.$1
Entries.summer_Mon: I'm going on a special quest to gather something called 'fiddlehead' in the forest.$1#$b#Teacher needs it for a potion.$3
Entries.summer_Tue: Sometimes I ask teacher if Vincent or Jas can come visit. She always says no.$2
Entries.summer_Wed8: I'm going on a field trip tomorrow!$3#$e#I asked if you could come but teacher said no.$0
Entries.summer_Thu: *yawn*...$3#$b#I didn't sleep much last night.$0#$e#Why? I was practicing magic!$1#$e#Don't tell teacher!$5
Entries.fall_15: Welwick is running her clairvoyance booth tomorrow.$1#$e#Teacher says she's really powerful.$0
Entries.fall_Mon: Did you know teacher built the tower on a 'magical field'?$0#$e#It helps her focus her mana!$3
Entries.fall_Tue: I'm going on a very important quest to gather potent magical mushrooms in the forest!$3#$e#This is my chance to show teacher I'm reliable.$1#$e#%You tell Morgan they can do it. They smile at you.
Entries.fall_Thu: Do you know anything about Andy?$0#$b#I don't think he likes magic.$0#$e#Maybe I should pull a prank on him?$3#$e#%You explain to Morgan they shouldn't pull a prank on Andy.#$e#Oh. Um. Sorry. I won't. Don't tell teacher.$2
Entries.fall_Fri: Teacher is teaching me the 'Merlin Doctrine'. It's like a big rulebook for mages.$0#$e#It's reeeeeally boring.$2
Entries.fall_Sat6: There's a blocked warp with the sign scratched off in the warp hall. I wonder what it was?$0#$b#Teacher forbids me from asking about it. But she'll tell me someday.$4
Entries.fall_Sun: I want to try fire magic but I'm not allowed to.$8#$e#Teacher says it's very hard to control.$0
Entries.fall_Sun8: Marlon and teacher were talking and I overheard them. Something about a big battle across the ocean.$0#$e#There's a mage they know who's fighting on the 'other side'. I don't know what that means.$0
Entries.winter_7: The area where the ice fishing festival takes place has a great mana pool too.$1#$e#Um. Teacher and I will be nearby. Try to find us!$1
Entries.winter_24: Teacher said I'm not allowed to give magical gifts.$2
Entries.winter_Tue: Since it's freezing outside, I'm gonna convince teacher to let me try fire magic.$1#$e#Hmm, you're right. I guess it could be dangerous.$2
Entries.winter_Thu: I've asked teacher about adopting an animal from Marnie's. She said 'maybe'!$3

Entries.Lance: Perhaps I'll join Rasmodia on the cliffside after the dancing ceremony.$0

Entries.funLeave_Lance: The First Slash hopes to pioneer a magic bubble capable of exploring 'Ethereal Trench' at the bottom of the Gem Sea.$0#$b#It would need to withstand over 1,700 bars of pressure...$5#$e#Several wizards and witches in our circle, such as Rasmodia, can create one.$0#$b#But they're only capable of withstanding 250 bars of pressure.$6

Entries.funReturn_Wizard: I'm sure you had a productive day today. Make sure you take the time to relax this evening.$0#$e#%Rasmodia smiles at me.
With all the heartache in my past, I never thought I'd wake up to days as sweet as these...$0#$e#Thank you for giving this grumpy witch a chance.$4

A new spell I was testing backfired. I feel... not quite myself.$3#$e#If you wake up to a frog in the bed tonight, I left a little satchel of powder on the table.$3#$e#Just sprinkle some on me.$3#$e#...$3#$e#%Rasmodia doesn't look so good...
With all the heartache in my past, I never thought I'd wake up to days as sweet as these...$0#$e#Thank you for giving this grumpy witch a chance.$4

Entries.TwoKids_0: Of all the beautiful places I've visited in the course of my work, none of them hold a candle to this farmhouse with our little family.$1#$e#%Rasmodia smiles at me.
Entries.fall_16: I hope you've prepared a showcase for the fair that accurately represents your considerable talents.$1#$e#%Rasmodia smiles at me.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: I'm sure you had a productive day today. Make sure you take the time to relax this evening.$0#$e#%Rasmodia smiles at me.
Entries.Bad_4: A new spell I was testing backfired. I feel... not quite myself.$3#$e#If you wake up to a frog in the bed tonight, I left a little satchel of powder on the table.$3#$e#Just sprinkle some on me.$3#$e#...$3#$e#%Rasmodia doesn't look so good...
Entries.Good_2: With all the heartache in my past, I never thought I'd wake up to days as sweet as these...$0#$e#Thank you for giving this grumpy witch a chance.$4

Entries.patio_Wizard: A pleasant day to be out and about. Care to join me?$1

Entries.Indoor_Night_3: *chuckle* I heard cackling outside. She must be flying tonight...$5#$e#Every mage in our circle is aware of Rasmodia's breakup. It was very dramatic. Quite the event.$0
Entries.Neutral_2: Rasmodia studies ancient fruit and I study monster crops...$5#$e#In a strange way, our work is somewhat similar.$1

Entries.AuroraVineyard.28: The Junimo writing isn't legible... Maybe the witch can read it?
Entries.Forest.50: Everything here is magical because it's right next to the Witch's tower. Makes sense, right?
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.3: X X X WARNING!!! X X X MONSTERS AHEAD!!! X X X^^"Please be wary of deadly monsters in this part of the maze. If you choose to continue further, you are responsible for your own life and wellbeing."^^-M. Rasmodia^^

Entries.ShrineOfIllusionsLetter: Greetings @,^^You've proven your trustworthiness. I would like to propose I teach you some basic magic. Visit me in my chambers at your earliest convenience.^^   -M. Rasmodia

Entries.1000013_KeepSecret: pause 700/speak Caroline "Thank you, @.$0"/pause 600/move Caroline 0 0 2/pause 900/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 750/speak Caroline "First, you need to understand Pierre and I have a complicated relationship, but I love him, and I always will.$2#$b#We got together when we were very young. Not long into our relationship, I caught Pierre fooling around with a girl in Grampleton.$2#$b#I was devastated when I found out. My naive self thought the appropriate response was to... get involved with someone else to get back at him.$2#$b#That other person...$2"/pause 1250/emote Caroline 28/pause 1000/speak Caroline "That other person was Rasmodia...$2"/emote farmer 16/pause 600/speak Caroline "Pierre and I had some horrible fights and... broke up. We got back together after a couple months.$2"/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Caroline 28/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 1100/speak Caroline "Soon after that, I found out I was pregnant. I... I'm not even sure how it's possible...#$b#I didn't know if it was Rasmodia's or Pierre's.$2#$b#I never told Pierre I saw someone else, so he had no reason to suspect Abigail wasn't his.$2"/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 900/speak Caroline "Ever since Abigail dyed her hair purple several years ago, it's never faded. I thought that was very strange...$2#$b#Now my daughter is seeing magical creatures in the forest and taking an interest in fighting monsters...$2#$b#There's only one explanation. Abigail isn't my husband's daughter. Rasomodia is her father... or a mother... I don't know how to even call her...$2"/emote farmer 16/pause 550/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Caroline "I hadn't spoken to Rasmodia in so many years. What we had was a long, long time ago. She was surprised to find me at her doorstep.$2#$b#I told her about Abigail, and that she's her daughter. She said she had a feeling one of the residents here in Stardew Valley was her child.$2"/pause 1500/move Caroline 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Caroline 28/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Caroline "I... I cried so much. I felt horrible she was just now finding out she was a mother.$2#$b#She brewed me some kind of potion to calm me down and explained what Junimos were, and why she is able to see them.$2#$b#She comforted me and gave me some advice.$2"/pause 1500/speak Caroline "...$2"/pause 2000/speak Caroline "I still don't know what I'm going to tell Pierre, or if I should tell him anything at all. And then there's Abigail...$2#$b#Rasmodia told me it's up to me to decide if she should know.$2#$b#I appreciate she isn't forcing me to say anything, or demanding I let her have a relationship with her. I... I feel horrible and guilty.$2"/pause 2250/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 3000/speak Caroline "I will tell my family, but not now. In the meantime, you MUST not tell anyone about this, @. Please...$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "#I'm sorry you're going through all of this.#I'm going to tell Pierre and Abigail - they have a right to know."/fork 1000013_SwearGranpaGrave/pause 500/move Caroline 0 0 3/shake Caroline 9999999/emote Caroline 12/speak Caroline "!!!$3#$b#I TRUSTED YOU! YOU ARE THE WORST!$3"/emote farmer 28/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Caroline -2500/end dialogue Caroline "I see you haven't told Pierre and Abigail yet, so what are you waiting for exactly, @?$3#$e#%Caroline is ignoring you."
Entries.1000013_SwearGranpaGrave: pause 750/speak Caroline "...Thank you.$2"/pause 1500/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 750/speak Caroline "I... I know that's a lot to take in. As for my husband...$2"/pause 2000/emote Caroline 28/emote farmer 60/pause 650/speak Caroline "I don't know what his reaction will be. I'm emotionally exhausted...$2"/pause 500/move Caroline 9 0 1 true/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Caroline "Hi, @. Umm... hopefully you have a moment?$0#$b#I just wanted to say I appreciate the conversation we had about Abigail.$2#$b#I need to think about what I'm going to tell Pierre and Abigail...$2#$b#I'm terrified it's not going to go well...$2"

Entries.Wizard_wizardNap: Greetings @,^^I must apologize for the state in which you found me the other day. On occasion I find my sleep plagued with dark dreams and I, childishly, resort to avoiding my bed. It shames me to know you witnessed such behavior from me. Nevertheless, I would like to thank you for choosing to stay with me. With you nearby I slept soundly as I have not for several weeks.^If I can ever repay you, you have but to ask.^^ Sincerely,^ Rasmodia
Entries.Wizard_teachMagic: Greetings @,^^Many untold wonders are sheltered amongst the trees. Today, in particular, a strange energy stirs in the forest.^If you would like to learn heretofore unknown secrets, meet me in the hidden woods north of my tower.^^ Sincerely,^ M. Rasmodia

Entries.NPC.cs.4439: Much as I am eager to be a mother, I cannot help but be apprehensive about the changes a child will bring to our lives...$2#$e#Swear to me that whatever comes, we will make the changes for the better.$1
Entries.NPC.cs.4427: You look at me and see a reclusive freak, don't you?#$e#It is what I am...$2
Entries.NPC.cs.4429: Sometimes I catch sight of myself in the mirror and wonder what you saw in this boring face.$2#$e#Do you see it, still?$4

Entries.spring_Mon10: Despite the focus I have on my studies, I have always wanted to be a mother.$3#$b#Would it be presumptuous of me to ask how you feel about children?$1#$e#Perhaps we could...$1#$b#Well.$3#$b#Never mind.$4
Entries.winter_Sat6: I am refreshed today, and I've come to terms with my feelings. I may not be a mother to her, but I can still be a good person.$1#$b#I hope you forgive my oddness of late, @. You have seen me in a moment of weakness.$4#$e#Seek knowledge, seek answers. Have a good one.$1
Entries.winter_Fri10: My name is...I still don't remember.$3#$b#No, the 'M' doesn't stand for anything. Or, at least, it didn't.$3#$b#I suppose I could make something up. That's where 'Rasmodia' came from.#7#$b#Magus. A good, wizardly name, don't you think?$3#$e#It's no use. If you tire of 'Witch'... well. Rasmodia is alright, no?$1
Entries.spring_24: ...You want me to attend the Flower Dance?$3#$b#I think not. Such frivolous displays are beyond me.#$b#Besides, I'm much too untrained to dance.$1#$b#You'll just have to enjoy yourself without me.$1#$e#...#$b#Please don't dance with anyone else.$4
Entries.winter_2: I wish I could reveal my true name to you, @. In truth, I just don't remember it.$4#$b#Was it Carla? Or Hannah? Maybe Jolyne?$1#$b#I think it was a good name. It's hard to know.#$e#Maybe it was @! Imagine that?$1
Entries.winter_Mon10: I wish I could reveal my true name to you, @. In truth, I just don't remember it.$4#$b#Was it Carla? Or Hannah? Maybe Jolyne?$1#$b#I think it was a good name. It's hard to know.#$e#Maybe it was @! Imagine that?$1
Entries.spring_Fri6: All the powers in the universe are not enough to fix a broken heart. It can be mended, but once shattered, so shall it remain.$2#$b#Someday I will find a way to fix my own, but even that may take centuries.$2#$b#Sorry to bore you with problems of this lonely witch.$0#$e#Focus your mind today, @, and be at peace.$1

Entries.Wizard: You still create quite the hubbub among the elementals this time of year.$1#$b#What can I say? You're extraordinary.$1#$b#The elementals circulating you should consider themselves blessed to be allowed in your presence.$1#$b#Perhaps they might smite me for saying such contentious things, but what wife would I be if I said otherwise.$3#$e#If even the elementals are blessed, then I'm truly the luckiest woman in the world.$6

Entries.OneKid_0: {{Random: Despite the focus I have on my studies, I had always wanted to be a mother. At long last, I can see this wish come true.$1#$e#Just one more thing you have granted me.$1 @@ Have you seen %kid1, recently?#$e#What? No. Of course I didn't lose our child#$b#Everything is under control.$1 @@ There's something magical about children, isn't there?$1#$b#Imagination without limits is a powerful tool.$1 @@ When our child is old enough, we should go for a vacation on Ginger Island.$1#$e#I'd like them to grow up with a wide view of the world, beyond just this little valley.$1|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.TwoKids_0: {{Random: When I said I wished to be a mother, I do not think I fully understood the implications.$3#$b#What I meant was that I should like to have the knowledge that I had brought a life into this world, and to watch a child grow to maturity and strength before he moved on to do good unto the world.$3#$e#I did not realize that involved quite so much work.$1 @@ Do you ever stand here and marvel at the two beautiful children our love has brought into the world?$1#$e#I do every day.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.TwoKids_2: {{Random: I went to work in my tower, the other day, expecting increased productivity in the quiet...#$b#and yet, as soon as %kid1 and %kid2 were out of my sight, I felt an ache of longing to hold them in my arms once more. I could not even focus for long enough to complete a single ritual.$2#$e#Is this what it means to be a mother?$3 @@ We're blessed that %kid1 and %kid2 have your features$1.#$e#It wouldn't feel right for any child to look like this old witch.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Twokids_3: {{Random: %kid1 has your eyes. Sometimes we lock gazes and I find myself lost in them. I wonder what a child sees when looking upon one such as I.$3#$e#A mother, I hope. And nothing less.$1 @@ This life... with you and our children...$4#$b#It's more than I ever thought I would have.$1#$e#Thank you, @, for choosing me.$4 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.winter_4: My name is...I still don't remember.#$b#No, the 'M' doesn't stand for anything. Or, at least, it didn't.$3#$b#I suppose I could make something up. That's where 'Rasmodia' came from.$1#$b#Rasmodia. A good, wizardly name, don't you think?$1#$b#Or should I try mundane?$3#$b#Hannah?$3#$e#It's no use. If you tire of 'Witch'... well. Rasmodia is alright, no?$1
Entries.Good_2: {{Random: Before we wed, I considered my life more or less at an end.#$b#I would toil on through the land of the living for some untold number of decades, in all likelihood, but it was as a flat ground at the bottom of a slope. Already I had climbed the mountain and come down the other side.#$b#I thought I should see no more mountains, in my time. And yet, here we are.$1#$e#You give my life new purpose, @.$1 @@ You know... I fell for you long before you gave me that bouquet.$4#$e#I never said a word.$4#$b#I thought you could never love a woman like me.$1 @@ With all the heartache in my past, I never thought I'd wake up to days as sweet as these...$0#$e#Thank you for giving an aloof old witch a chance.$4 |inputSeparator=@@}}

Entries.OneKid_0: {{Random: Despite the focus I have on my studies, I had always wanted to be a mother. At long last, I can see this wish come true.$1#$e#Just one more thing you have granted me.$1 @@ Have you seen %kid1, recently?#$e#What? No. Of course I didn't lose our child#$b#Everything is under control.$1 @@ There's something magical about children, isn't there?$1#$b#Imagination without limits is a powerful tool.$1 @@ When our child is old enough, we should go for a vacation on Ginger Island.$1#$e#I'd like them to grow up with a wide view of the world, beyond just this little valley.$1|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: {{Random: Ah, @. It warms my soul to have you once more beside me.$1#$b# Come. Speak to me of your day; I wish to hear everything.$1#$e#Me? I encountered a curious sprite lost between planes. I was able to guide it back on course, with no harm done.$1 @@ Did you have a productive day, today? You look full ready for bed.$1#$b#Why not take a break, tomorrow? You work hard enough.$1#$e#What do you mean I'm the one always overworking?$3 @@ I'm sure you had a productive day today. Make sure you take the time to relax this evening.$1#$e#%Rasmodia smiles at me. |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.TwoKids_0: {{Random: When I said I wished to be a mother, I do not think I fully understood the implications.$3#$b#What I meant was that I should like to have the knowledge that I had brought a life into this world, and to watch a child grow to maturity and strength before he moved on to do good unto the world.$3#$e#I did not realize that involved quite so much work.$1 @@ Do you ever stand here and marvel at the two beautiful children our love has brought into the world?$1#$e#I do every day.$1 @@ Of all the beautiful places I've visited in the course of my work, none of them hold a candle to this farmhouse with our little family.$1#$e#%Rasmodia smiles at me. @@ I do hope at least one of our children decides to follow in my footsteps.$0#$e#I suppose that's a little vain, isn't it? But the world of magic is one I'd like all of us to share.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.TwoKids_2: {{Random: I went to work in my tower, the other day, expecting increased productivity in the quiet...#$b#and yet, as soon as %kid1 and %kid2 were out of my sight, I felt an ache of longing to hold them in my arms once more. I could not even focus for long enough to complete a single ritual.$2#$e#Is this what it means to be a mother?$3 @@ We're blessed that %kid1 and %kid2 have your features$1.#$e#It would be a cruel twist of fate indeed for any child to look like me.$1 @@ I think I saw one of our children manifesting early signs of telekinesis today!$3#$e#A teddy bear slid right off a shelf...perhaps they summoned it!$3#$b#...Yes, I admit that the bear may have simply fallen down.$2 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Twokids_3: {{Random: %kid1 has your eyes. Sometimes we lock gazes and I find myself lost in them. I wonder what a child sees when looking upon one such as I.$3#$e#A mother, I hope. And nothing less.$1 @@ This life... with you and our children...$4#$b#It's more than I ever thought I would have.$1#$e#Thank you, @, for choosing me.$4 @@ What do you think of asking Abigail to babysit?$0#$e#...Just a thought.$1 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Bad_4: {{Random: Hmph. @@ I had hoped I would only ever live through one broken heart...$2 @@ A new spell I was testing backfired. I feel... not quite myself.#$e#If you wake up to a frog in the bed tonight, I left a little satchel of powder on the table.#$e#Just sprinkle some on me.#$e#...$2#$e#%Rasmodia doesn't look so good... |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.fall_16: {{Random: My old friend Welwick has come to town for the fair.$1#$b#Her divination skills outshine even mine.$1 @@ I hope you've prepared a showcase for the fair that accurately represents your considerable talents.$1#$e#%Rasmodia smiles at me. |inputSeparator=@@}}
